titleStmt.title: A proclamation, whereas the Parliament hath been prorogued until the tenth day of February next James R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill deceas'd, and by Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: By the King, a proclamation.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall the eighth day of January 1685/6.
